page.title: 09ABERDEEN: ROAD SAFETY.
page.content:
A Lollypop Man (or Lady) is a person employed by the council to help children safely across roads. He has a a round sign on a pole that looks like lollypop - a children's sweet. The sign says STOP CHILLDREN.
There are two Lollypop Men in the area near Seaton School.
When they want the traffic to stop they walk in the road and hold up their sign. The cars stop and the children cross.
Some Lollypop Men are retired from their normal jobs and just do it to make a bit extra. One said he liked the job because he meets all the boys and girls.
